sentences.en: ...a spiral staircase.
sentences.cn: …一段旋梯。

sentences.en: A snail's shell is spiral in form.
sentences.cn: 蜗牛壳呈螺旋形。

sentences.en: Crime has spiraled out of control .
sentences.cn: 犯罪活动激增，已经失控。

sentences.en: Experts watch the spiral development in industry with keen interest.
sentences.cn: 专家们以很大的兴趣观察工业的螺旋式的发展.

sentences.en: Her hair was styled into a cascade of spiral curls.
sentences.cn: 她的头发被做成了瀑布般的螺旋形鬈发.

sentences.en: House prices will continue to spiral downwards.
sentences.cn: 房价将继续暴跌。

sentences.en: Libraries have however remained locked in their growth spiral.
sentences.cn: 然而,图书馆仍然处在不断增长的阶梯上.

sentences.en: Production costs began to spiral.
sentences.cn: 生产成本开始急遽上升。

sentences.en: Spiral galaxies are considered to be gravitationally bound configurations of stars.
sentences.cn: 旋涡星系被认为是由恒星组成的引力束缚系统.

sentences.en: The birds circled in a slow spiral above the house.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿在房子上空缓缓盘旋。

sentences.en: The damaged plane spiralled to the ground.
sentences.cn: 受损的飞机盘旋坠地

sentences.en: The light house has spiral stairs leading to the top.
sentences.cn: 塔有个盘旋上升通向塔顶的梯子.

sentences.en: The maze is actually two interlocking spirals.
sentences.cn: 这个迷宫实际上是两个连锁的螺旋体。

sentences.en: The night went on, and the great spiral dance continued.
sentences.cn: 夜正浓, 那漫长的盘旋上升的舞蹈连续着.

sentences.en: The production in this factory is spiral.
sentences.cn: 这个厂的产量呈盘旋上升.

sentences.en: The smoke spiral ( l ) ed up.
sentences.cn: 烟缭绕上升.

sentences.en: Their profits began to spiral down disastrously.
sentences.cn: 他们的利润开始螺旋形地急剧下降.

sentences.en: There is a curious feature in the spectra of spiral galaxies.
sentences.cn: 在旋涡星系的光谱中有一种奇妙的特征.

sentences.en: These rolls are corrugated cylinders, usually of the spiral type.
sentences.cn: 粉碎辊是波纹式滚筒, 还常是螺旋割纹式.

sentences.en: Twisting arises in boards through the presence of spiral or interlocking grain.
sentences.cn: 翘曲多发生在螺旋或交错纹理的板材中.

sentences.en: Vines spiralled upward toward the roof.
sentences.cn: 藤蔓螺旋式向上朝屋顶生长。
